content.raw:
It works for me with gcc 4.8 on saucy if it doesn't try to install DART. Perhaps we can disable the [find_package(DARTCore)](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/fe875274eca56d60ea1ce4a2d946faed2434aff1/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake?at=default#cl-140) for coverage builds until we resolve the Eigen issue.

If you approve @nkoenig , I'll make an issue about the eigen problem and disable dart support for coverage builds.
content.html:
It works for me with gcc 4.8 on saucy if it doesn't try to install DART. Perhaps we can disable the find_package(DARTCore) for coverage builds until we resolve the Eigen issue.

If you approve @nkoenig , I'll make an issue about the eigen problem and disable dart support for coverage builds.
